entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IndexOutOfRangeException when using one-shot AES decrypt with empty array #109658
    10.0.0
  • Libraries jitstress: Assertion failed 'target->hasProfileWeight()' #109657
    10.0.0
  • [9.0][wasm] error NETSDK1147: To build this project, the following workloads must be installed: wasm-tools #109653
  • Improve Arm64 Performance in .NET 10 #109652
    10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Support assembly check for SVE APIs while testing #109644
  • ARM64-SVE: Optimise mask usage for AddSequentialAcross function #109643
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: error IL1012: IL Trimmer has encountered an unexpected error. #109640
    10.0.0
  • [browser][MT] JSHostImplementation.CallEntrypoint - The handle is invalid #109636
    10.0.0
  • JIT struct work planned for .NET 10 #109635
    10.0.0
  • How to change System.Private.CoreLib.dll find path? #109633
  • Runtime-async open issues #109632
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.ProcessStart_OnLinux_UsesSpecifiedProgramUsingArgumentList #109630

Closed

  • CancellationToken.CanBeCanceled returns True for disposed CancellationTokenSource #109639
  • ARM64 Real World - Roslyn #89119
    Future
  • [ARM] JIT Compile time is too slower than mono(4.4.2) #6589
    Future
  • [ARM32/ARM64] Introducing swap operation without temporary register #6323
    Future
  • Arm64: Use VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension APIs in libraries #84328
    Future
  • Optimize workload upload step #60687
    Future
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException: Invalid argument when buffers count is greater than 1024 #108383
    10.0.0
  • Environment.GetFolderPath(SpecialFolder.LocalApplicationData) returns empty path on certain macOS #109614
  • Move dotnet/runtime to new RPM tooling #109518
    10.0.0
  • [browser] why is the garbage collector not doing its job? #108397
    10.0.0
  • SslStream.AuthenticateAsClientAsync has periodically spikes (every 5 minutes). #108721
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add Span<byte> support to System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData #108734
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Check input length for empty when decrypting with padding #109660
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Remove CoreCLR PAL's InternalNew/Delete and just use new/delete with std::nothrow #109659
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: postdominators #109656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update trimmer attributes for `ComActivator` #109655
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] add v2 ExecutionManager contract for NibbleMap change #109654
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Slight clean-up of mock descriptors test helpers #109651
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix upload conflict Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref in official build #109650
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Set TargetsLinuxGlibc to false on Android #109649
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109648
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109646
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 9.0.x
  • extend xml docs with OverflowException information #109645
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 10.0.0
  • Rework HttpClient content buffering #109642
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [NO REVIEW] experiment with indirect result #109637
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Remove unnecessary StreamReader.EndOfStream call from NetworkInformation #109631
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • Use 1ES templateContext for workloads upload #109647
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Move GenTreeVecCon and GenTreeMskCon under the respective FEATURE_* defines #104932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Simplify temporary keychain password-gen #109422
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • Avoid hardcoded illink.tasks TFM #109634
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Handle IOV_MAX limit in RandomAccess #109340
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • Exclude shared libs from ilcframework in nupkg #109253
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109511
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.12
  • Convert dotnet/runtime to use the new Arcade tooling for RPMs #109526
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove and readd .deb, .rpm, and .pkg as FileExtensionSignInfos #109628
    needs-area-label
  • Expand an optimization for short values to IgnoreCase in single-value SearchValues<string> #108368
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Check in offsets files used for AOT cross compilers #109612
    area-Build-mono
  • use `Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime` for rate limiter #109213
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Fix up some documented exceptions #108896
    area-System.Collections
  • Add Span<byte> overloads for ProtectedData #109529
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on System.Version #109252
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Remove uncompiled `net7.0` files #109342
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add regression testing for source generated with .NET 9 #109448
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Respect `ClassInterfaceAttribute` during COM server activation #109616
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Handle non-default active version and explicit IL code version cases for `CodeVersions.GetActiveNativeCodeVersion` #109560
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Add AOT annotations to System.Private.Xml and System.Data.Common #109528
    area-System.Xml
  • Add FromFile to BinaryData #107231
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Constant Time Lookup NibbleMap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #109567
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove ConcurrentDictionary lookups from Unix socket event loop #109052
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 10.0.0
  • [EventTrace] AddEventPipe filter data parsing #109624
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [EventTrace] Update check for provider triggered GC #109587
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add support for (experimental) profile-based trimming #108049
    Hackathon, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Add support for deterministic compilation #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Build the cdac as part of clr.tools instead of as a prereq to the runtime native build #109598
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update Android image to one with a new NDK and command line tools #109622
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #109580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add CreateChained to RateLimiter #107230
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile instead of USERPROFILE #108559
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadSequence #109595
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadSequence #109596
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Implement Vector.AddSaturate/SubtractSaturate #107193
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: Mark some intrinsics as must-expand for NAOT due to ILScanner dependencies #109609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2577970 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement `DAMT.*WithInherited` #109608
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Update IHttpClientLogger.cs and IHttpClientAsyncLogger.cs remarks #109618
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [HTTP] WinHttpHandler - Increase the default drain size #109610
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Speed up single-value SearchValues<string> candidate verification #108365
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [WASIp2] soft debugger via sockets #109584
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.1
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add ObsoleteAttribute and EditorBrowsable(Never) to DynamicDependency.Condition #107104
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add left handed spherical and cyclindrical billboards #109605
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Apply OverloadResolutionPriority to Span-based delegating to ROS counterparts #109602
    area-System.Memory
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Encode missing tailcall in GC info #109512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • fix for `MissingTestException` #109577
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Fix GC holes for suspended runtime-async methods + collectible assemblies #2759

PullRequests

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] added full demangling results with easy accessors and cleaned up the code to require fewer allocations #2761
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Runtime Async] Addressing test failures. #2760
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support System.Net.Http.HttpClient - leftovers #2758
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • [SwiftBindings] Nominal type descriptor #2748
  • [SwiftBindings] docs for existential containers #2751
  • [SwiftBindings] Better demangle errors #2757
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge oct 01 #2750
  • [Runtime Async] Add support for shared generics #2755

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Segmentation fault on ARMv7 platforms with .NET 6.0.33 #44747
  • Missing net9.0 Templates in Test Environment #44736

Closed

  • The error "Unable to find package Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset with version (= 10.0.100-alpha.1.24556.12)" appeared when creating the .NET project based on latest .NET SDK 10.0 with 17.12.0 Preview 5.0 #44703

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2578324 #44765

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Summary Xml-Doc actively breaks code #75838
  • GenerateMSBuildEditorConfig task breaks incremental build on Windows when using different casing paths #75834
  • Unexpected semantic information from bad method group conversion in local declaration #75833
  • No diagnostics reported for struct cycle across instance and static fields #75832
  • `UnscopedRef` affects C# 10 code #75828

Closed

  • Remove custom entry point finder from Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.Implementation.ProjectSystem.AbstractEntryPointFinder #35376
    18.0
  • Remove references to Solution snapshot entities from GenerateTypeDialogViewModel #42929
    18.0
  • C# foreach smart indent doesn't work correctly for the 'else' part without a '{ }' block #35702
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35507.203 #75826
  • Failling test TestMatchWithTurkishIWorkaround9 #75823

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix source-generator reload when in 'balanced' mode #75831
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disallow escaping refs to implicit rvalue temporaries #75830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Null-conditional assignment 1 #75821
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable TypeDefinitionProvider LSP capability #75819
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Bail out of on-the-fly-docs for razor documents #75818
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add runtime async design doc #75816
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce IVsFreeThreadedFileChangeEvents2.DirectoryChangedEx2 notifications from VS shell #75815
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Extract local functions to members #75837
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Change inline diagnostics tagger to be a viewport tagger #75836
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue classifying while performing a layout #75791
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup and document code. #75829
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #75835
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update entry point finder to support `async Main` #75808
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ref safety: replace uint scope with struct SafeContext #75647
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure frozen snapshots don't return less data if solution already has compilation data (backport to 17.12) #75803
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix indentation of 'else' keyword after typing it #75806
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #75820
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75822
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Cherry pick telemetry fix #75817
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure frozen snapshots don't return less data if solution already has compilation data #75796
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Bump Telemetry to match VS #75813
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update release/vscode branch with changes in 2.55.21 tag #75814
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge pull request #75552 from dotnet/dev/jorobich/dont-retain-prval-… #75812
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75839
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Struct layout check – break an infinite generic expansion cycle that doesn’t include the target struct (a cycle at the end of the path) #75702
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update VSSDK and Gladstone versions #75594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust semantic model for method group conversion #75719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not run 'remove unnecessary imports' on generated code #74762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode, Backlog
  • Modify segmented list to grow by growth rate. #75756
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EE: Support compact name in `IDkmLanguageInstructionDecoder.GetMethodName()` implementation #75764
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Test some assumptions (2) in OverloadResolution.vb #75792
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Parse directives in trailing trivia as skipped tokens trivia #75724
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Bump Razor to 9.0.0-preview.24555.12 #75794
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow user to control if they want generated-doc results to appear in navigate to. #74765
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Recover better when a user uses commas in a for-statement instead of semicolons #75632
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RequestLocalizationMiddleware does not handle CultureInfo.InvariantCulture since version 8 #58843
  • [Identity][UI] Fix asset path for endpoint definitions #58841
  • Routing with common prefix #58838
  • Interactable UI During Exporting in Blazor WebAssembly #58836
  • JwtSecurityTokenHandler.ReadJwtToken is not reading the issuer #58835
  • Not found routes causes Blazor WASM to reload. #58834

Closed

  • Concurrency Issue in OpenApiSchemaStore #58845
  • Quarantine StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #39477
    Test failures
  • Embed a Blazor component inside an Angular App needs very long to be rendered #58831
  • .NET 6/7 migration to .NET 8 with Docker container #53327
  • Unhandled error when using Blazor .NET 8 template in Global page mode with FireFox #58824
  • my clients logouts after 30 minutes #58609

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix IIS outofprocess to remove WebSocket compression handshake #58846
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Handling CultureInfo.InvariantCulture in RequestLocalizationMiddleware #58844
    community-contribution, area-middleware

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `1204d63` to `d144031` #58840
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Support returning OpenAPI document in YAML from MapOpenApi #58616
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24553.6 #58776
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `1204d63` #58743
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `9511905` to `9aeb12b` #58744
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `1204d63` #58745
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Correct typo in ProtectedPersonalDataAttribute.cs & PersonalDataAttribute.cs #58664
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS app crash with MAUI 8.0.72 Xcode 15.4 simulator MacOS 14.7.1 #25756
  • Application display version not updating on Android #25755
  • [Performance issue] Creation and display of ContentView takes too long when displayed for the first time #25754
  • iOS BackButton Title cannot be set to string.Empty or "" #25742

Closed

  • It takes far too long for pull requests to be merged! #25747
  • Splash screen is displayed incorrectly in dark mode #19775
    Backlog
  • iOS Scrolling is super laggy #25753
  • dotnet publish -f net8.0-ios -c Release is way too slow #20090
  • FlyoutPage memory leaks - iOS, MacCatalyst #25505
  • ContentTemplate pages are not executing functions. #20777
  • Publishing MAUI App to the Store - The newly created provisioning profile is not listed, but the old ones are, and the "Download manual profiles" process has been done from Xcode #25741
  • Unable to debug MAUI Android app using `<AndroidDeviceUserId>10</AndroidDeviceUserId>` #25730
  • [NAA] Enable disable Exchange Legacy Tokens in your tenant #25733
  • The RealParent on Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Button has been Garbage Collected. This should never happen #25739
  • WebAuthenticator freezes in case when system kills app process #23622
  • BindableObjects not getting collected causing memory leak, android #24478
  • Toolbar is not displayed after deactive an app and activate it again. #24169
  • iOS singleton dependency injection wrong lifecycle #25501
  • .NET MAUI how to render HTML in Label #25211
  • .net maui help #25591
  • An Error #25546

PullRequests

Created

  • Update sr1 with ga #25752
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 4 #25751
    community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    community ✨
  • Fixed the Label height within VerticalStackLayout is truncated when width is set #25748
    community ✨
  • Revamp new project template build/test script #25744
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-templates
  • Toggling Header/Footer in CollectionView Dynamically throws an exception #25743
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Merged

  • [iOS] Revert CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items #25738

Updated

  • [Windows] Fix crash when navigating pages #25740
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] RadioButton throws CGContextSetLineWidth - Fix #25542
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • made FilterQuality configurable for Resizetizer #25686
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing
  • Re-Enable Template Tests #25674
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-templates, area-controls-switch
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Character spacing in button - fix #25657
    community ✨, area-controls-button

  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing

    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR2

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 2 #25731
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix for OnAppearing of Page called again, although this page was on already replaced NavigationStack #25596

  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How can I update a Many to Many with Payload joining table #35064

Closed

  • Does a release version (e.g. 8.0.10) require the same .NET runtime version? #35063
  • Mapping Option<T> to nullable column #34940
  • Nullable foreign key generates not nullable column on postgres #35039
  • DbUpdateException instead of DbUpdateConcurrencyException #35043
  • Source Generators #35057
  • Rollback migration command for efcore #35015
  • Property not being ignored by EntityTypeBuilder #35017
